Breastfeeding more than 
one baby
Twins, triplets or more can be 
breastfed. Because multiple 
babies are more likely to be 
born prematurely and to have 
a low birth weight, breastmilk 
is especially important for 
their wellbeing. You will be 
supported to express if 
needed, until your babies are 
able to orally feed.
To	start	with,	you	may	find	it	
easier to feed each of your 
babies separately, until you feel 
confide
